profile:
Hardworking, Enthusiast, Not scared of failure and positive attitude for learning are some of the adjectives that describe me well.
Currently a Masters student in Computer Science with focus on domains of software engineering, web application development and operating systems.
Previously worked as Software Application Developer and Engineer at PayPal. Was part of the rewards and Incentive scrum team. Some of the key responsibilities were design and development of micro-services for the platform, design of database schema, Bug fixing, Enhancement of existing platform by developing modules and finally deployment and push to production.
As an Undergrad believed in the mantra of learning through projects, research and industrial internships. I interned at PayPal ( 6 months ), ARM (2 months) and SanFoundry (6 months) for multifarious roles.
Love making products.
